item.title: Noveny Herbal Eucalyptus Essential Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Herbal Eucalyptus Essential Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Acne control, Hair Care, Room diffuser, For Cold & Cough and Pain Relief (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. ACNE CONTROL & FACE CARE: Eucalyptus oil has antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties that helps in controlling Acne. Mix 2 drops of Eucalyptus anti-bacterial oil with a little water or moisturizer to get rid of acne.
  2. FOR COLD & COUGH: Eucalyptus oil is useful in clearing the throat and the nasal tract of the mucus and congestion. Apply 5 drops of eucalyptus oil on chest and rub to get relief from cold & cough.
  3. HAIR CARE: Eucalyptus Oil helps in fighting against dandruff with its anti-fungal properties and keeps lice away as well.Mix 3 drops of Eucalyptus oil into carrier oil and gently massage on the scalp. Wash after an hour.
  4. REFRESHING AROMA: Eucalyptus oil has a minty smell with a hint of honey. It has pungent, intoxicating scent. Add 5-10 drops of Eucalyptus oil to per 200ml water for a room diffuser.
  5. MUSCLES PAIN RELIEF: Eucalyptus oil is antispasmodic and gives relief to strained muscles. It re-energizes the muscles and helps in faster healing. Mix 5 drops of Eucalyptus oil with 1-2 tsp of a carrier oil for a relaxing massage and muscles pain.
  6. MIX WITH CARRIER OILS: Mix 2 drops of Carrot Seed Oil with carrier oil to use on hair ,face and muscle pain relief.
  7. Always use diluted essential oils before use as they are highly concentrated and should be handled with caution.Refer Noveny's Essential oil dilution guide or consult our experts.

The post Noveny Herbal Eucalyptus Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
